meanings.definition: The state or quality of being without flaws or imperfections.
meanings.sent1: Her artwork displayed remarkable flawlessnesses in every brushstroke.
meanings.sent2: The flawlessnesses of the diamond made it highly valuable.
meanings.sent3: The chef's quest for flawlessnesses in his dishes sometimes led to burnt dinners.
meanings.sent4: The garden was a vision of flawlessnesses, like a painting come to life.
meanings.sent5: The flawlessnesses of the plan ensured its success without any hiccups.

meanings.definition: The act of achieving perfection or flawlessness.
meanings.sent1: His dedication to flawlessnesses in his work earned him recognition.
meanings.sent2: The dancer's flawlessnesses on stage captivated the audience.
meanings.sent3: The race car driver's flawlessnesses around the track amazed everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her flawlessnesses in playing the piano were truly impressive.
meanings.sent5: The flawlessnesses of his performance left the judges in awe.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being free from defects or errors.
meanings.sent1: The flawlessnesses of the new software made it a favorite among users.
meanings.sent2: The flawlessnesses of her logic were evident in her argument.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's flawlessnesses in timing always got the biggest laughs.
meanings.sent4: The flawlessnesses of the design ensured its popularity among customers.
meanings.sent5: The flawlessnesses of the mechanism made it operate smoothly without any issues.
